3.title: Broadsheet WordPress Theme
3.text:
Broadsheet is a theme that is heavily influenced by Newspaper sites such as the New York Times.

The homepage has a flexible layout powered by 3 sidebars. The theme uses all of the standard WordPress functionality like custom headers giving you the ability to make things look awesome.

Broadsheet works great with the Jetpack plugin by Automattic. It's particularly handy for the image resizing.
